text: Magar on guruh az musrikon, ki ʙo onho pajmon ʙastaed va dar pajmoni xud hec kamʙudie najovardaand (ja'ne, xijonat nakardand) va ʙo hec kas ʙar ziddi sumo naʙaromadaand. Bo inho ʙa pajmoni xes to pojoni muddatas vafo kuned, hamono Alloh parhezgoronro (ononro, ki xijonat namekunand), dust medorad
